author: woonsan
msg: SCXML-114: changing the static JexlEngine member to instance member in order to allow custom settings on JexlEngine (by overriding #createJexlEngine()).
If someone wants to keep singleton for the efficiency of JexlEngine, then s/he can still keep singleton of JexlEvaluator instead.
